Question
========
For which month were the most flights recorded?


Answerlist
----------
* January
* February
* March
* April
* May
* June
* July
* August
* September
* October
* November
* December


Solution
========
The most flights (29,425) were recorded for July. You can extract this information using 
```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
NYCFlights %>%
  group_by( month ) %>%
  summarize( Number_of_Flights = n() )
```
